> <OLD - Hydras>
>
> "Pick up All information that you can, Scourge"and looking to Cryotek said
> "Now my tutor, tell use what the pit happened in your base?"

<NEW>

There was a nod from SCOURGE, "My sweeps are still looking, but trying
not to go too far into the realm until you arrive."

As HYDRAS looked to CRYOTEK to hear his story, the mech sat down in
one of the chairs, his large draconic wings on his back flipping up
slightly to allow him to do it with a sense of dignity and grace.
SCOURGE, SKY SHADOW, FRACTYL and INFERNO also did likewise, assuming
chairs at different points at the table.

"My base was attacked by three seekers." There was a frown on
CRYOTEK's face as he talked of the events. "It is as if they just
appeared in the middle of my base."

Shaking his head it was obvious that CRYOTEK was still troubled by the
events. "They quickly took out my generals and left." There was a
confused and sorrowful look on his face. "It was as if they knew
exactly who or what they were looking for and left."

Shrugging CRYOTEK continued, "They were good as thugs and such, but
they were never all that smart. I had to keep an constant optic on
them." He smiled slightly, "But they did have their uses."

"Sooo." CRYOTEK said, the word sounding almost like a sigh as he
glanced out of the window in the room which, among other things,
showed a bit of his shuttle as it sat outside HYDRAS' ship. "I took
everything of value from there and I have come here."

There was another shrug as CRYOTEK turned back to HYDRAS, "I don't
know where they came from or where they went."

"Did they have anything like this?" SCOURGE said as he pulled out the
device that DARK RODIMUS had used to escape. The device looked to be
about the size of a hand gun with lots of lights and such. although in
this case most of them were nurnt out.

CRYOTEK shook his head, "No. But then again I didn't see what they used."

From his position on the table FRACTYL looked over, "Let me see that."
Holding his hand out for the device.

SCOURGE looked as if he were going to keep it for a moment, but then
handed it over.

"Hmmmmm." FRACTYL said as examined the device, turining it over in
hands. "I wonder if we could get it working again." His voice trailed
off as he pulled out a small hand held scanner.

(TAG)

Preston
